description: Coefficients of x^n in Hermite polynomial H_{n+4}
references: M. Abramowitz and I. A. Stegun, eds., Handbook of Mathematical Functions, National Bureau of Standards Applied Math. Series 55, 1964 (and various reprintings), p. 801.
N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..500
M. Abramowitz and I. A. Stegun, eds., Handbook of Mathematical Functions, National Bureau of Standards, Applied Math. Series 55, Tenth Printing, 1972 [alternative scanned copy].
Index entries for sequences related to Hermite polynomials
mathematica: Table[Coefficient[HermiteH[n + 4, x], x, n], {n, 0, 25}] (* _T. D. Noe_, Aug 10 2012 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Simon Plouffe_
extensions: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Jan 29 2001
